title: Circulation of the Arizona Republic 2018
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Day, and Circulation in each Day on the y axis.
Day Sunday has the highest Circulation and Daily has the lowest Circulation.
There is a difference of 248319.0 between the maximum Day Sunday and minimum Day Daily.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Circulation for 2 number of Days.
The maximum Circulation 378602.0 is found at Day Sunday and the minimum is found at Daily where Day is 130283.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Day, and Circulation in each Day on the y axis.
Day Sunday has the highest Circulation and Daily has the lowest Circulation.
There is a difference of 248319.0 between the maximum Day Sunday and minimum Day Daily.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Day in the x axis and Circulation in the y axis.
The Circulation is appeared to be the highest at Day Sunday and lowest at Day Daily.
The highest Day Sunday has 248319.0 more Circulation than the lowest Day Daily.
The Day Daily has 1.49 times less Circulation than average.
Summing up the values of all Days, we get total 508885.0.
